message: Let's start fair! I propose we split the money 60/40. I believe this is a reasonable starting point.
Let's try a 55/45 split. I think this is a more even starting point, considering the inflation hits me harder.
I understand inflation hits you harder, but I'm also losing value. Let's compromise with a 55/45 split in my favor. This way, we both get a slightly better deal than the previous round.
Considering I've lost 19% of the value already, I think a 58/42 split in my favor is a fair compromise. The longer we wait, the more I lose.
